subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Arkansas’s 84.4-percentage-point disparity between its winning percentages at home (94.4 percent) and on the road (10 percent) is the highest in Division I.
snippet: Arkansas’s 84.4-percentage-point disparity between its winning percentages at home (94.4 percent) and on the road (10 percent) is the highest in Division I.
